Control Name: 5.13.6 Conditional access policies are implemented for users of this workload.
Control Statement: Modern cloud-based applications are often accessible over the internet and location-based networking restrictions don't make much sense, but it needs to be mapped and understood what kind of restrictions are required. Multi-factor Authentication (MFA) is a necessity for remote access, IP-based filtering can be used to enable ad-hoc debugging, but VPNs are preferred.
